content: wisdom of the moon shawl materials gauge aurora dk by wull studios 40% 21 stitches = 4 inches 10 cm in superfine alpaca 40% merino wool stockinette st 20% silk 252 yds 230 m / 3 5 oz gauge is not crucial to pattern but will 100 g affect yardage requirements and 2 skeins in waning crescent finished size at the given gauge the color a shawl uses virtually all 504 yds of color 1 skein in wisdom color b a 1 skein in august moon color c finished size us #5 3 75 mm circular 60 inches 152 cm from tip to tip by 28 needles or size to obtain gauge inches 71 cm from center top to lower edge relaxed after blocking wisdom of the moon shawl- copyright 2022 liz capik all rights reserved this pattern is available for free atwww wullstudios comand www ravelry com and is not to be sold or distributedelsewhere without express permission directions cast on 5 sts in color a using preferred cast on row 41-44 with color b repeat row 21-24 135 method sts work row 1-20 with color a work row 45-56 with color a row 1 kfb 4 times k1 9 sts row 45-48 repeat row 25-28 147 sts row 2 knit row 49-56 repeat row 5-6 171 sts row 3 k1 yo twice k2 yo pm k1 pm yo k2 yo k1 twice 15 sts row 57-58 with color b repeat row 21-22 break row 4 knit across row knitting all yo s from the yarn 177 sts previous row through the back loop row 5 k1 yo twice k to m yo slip m k1 slip m work row 59-61 with color a yo k to last 2 sts yo k1 twice 21 sts row 59-60 repeat row 5-6 183 sts row 6 k4 p to last 4 sts k4 when working a yo row 61 repeat row 5 189 sts from the previous row knit or purl in through the back loop row 62-64 are worked with colors a and c row 7-20 repeat row 5-6 63 sts simultaneously you will alternate between colors every stitch and the strands of yarn carried work row 21-24 with color b between stitches will twist and form the braid row 21 repeat row 5 69 sts pattern the skeins will twist as you work row 63 row 22 knit knitting yos from previous row tbl but you don t need to stop and untwist them unless row 23 repeat row 5 75 sts it becomes too difficult to keep working as they will row 24 k1 ktbl sl5 wyib k1 to last st k1 break untwist themselves in the next row yarn row 62 join color c p1 with color a p1 with color c to last st p1 with color a work row 25-40 with color a row 63 purl each color a st with color a and each row 25 repeat row 5 working yo s from row
